meta.content: Fundraising made easy! SSA Stores provide free online clothing and sports apparel stores to help support and fund schools, alumni, boosters and more. Additionally, we support churches, recreational sports teams or any other organization looking for an easy and free fundraising opportunity!

div.p: "I was concerned about the word FREE but I have never spent a dime. SSA built our company store free and they handle all our orders." ~ Sheryl Akers
"I bulk ordered shirts for our family camp and was very pleased with the quality and price. I highly recommend SSA." ~ Verna James
"Our custom clothing store really helps support our students goals and fundraising efforts during the year!" ~ Alice (PTA Member)
"Anyone can order our team apparel and sports wear online and we make money from every sale. I love our apparel store!" ~ James Almond

fieldset.p:
SSA Stores Inc.
10019 E Knox Ave
Spokane Valley, WA 99206

div.p: SSA Stores offer online school clothing, school apparel, sportswear and school shirts for sports teams, high schools, coaches, middle schools, alumni associations, boosters, parent teacher associations, students and faculty, Purchase school t-shirts, sweat shirts, school hoodies, school shirts, shorts, sweat pants, school jackets, caps, hats, spirit wear and other school merchandise. We also offer football, basketball, baseball, hockey, soccer, swimming, gymnastics, cheerleading and other sports apparel and school design graphics. Order embroidery; screen printed, screen printing, embroidered school spirit clothing, sports bags, stadium seats and high school team sportswear. School shirts for any school, team or sports fan. For more information please contact SSA Stores Inc. at 509-340-3717.
